name: Zaffa
content:
Zaffa was a Devaronian female Hetzalian government counselor to Minister Zeffren Ecka of the Outer Rim Territories' Hetzal system. In 232 BBY, the Devaronian was present on the star system's capital of Hetzal Prime and reported to Ecka when hyperspace anomalies threatened Hetzal's facilities, subsequently—and hesitantly—ordering a system-wide evacuation under the minister's command.
Zaffa appeared in Light of the Jedi, a novel written by Charles Soule and published in 2021 as part of the Star Wars: The High Republic multimedia project's Phase I.<ref name="Light of the Jedi">
